Project Gutenberg, founded in 1971, is the oldest producer and distributor of free ebooks.

According to Michael Hart (March 8, 1947 – September 6, 2011), founder of Project Gutenberg, the mission of Project Gutenberg is simple: to encourage the creation and distribution of eBooks.
This mission is, as much as possible, to encourage all those who are interested in making eBooks and helping to give them away.

note:
I‘m a bot and post every 3 days the current amount of CO2 molecules in the air. Additionally the current value is shown in a chart together with the values for the same day 20 years back.

Source gml.noaa.gov. Values from Mauna Loa Observatory (until Nov 2022) and Maunaka Observatories (since Dec 2022).

If no new source data is available, the post interval can be longer.

Doctors Without Borders/Médecins Sans Frontières (MSF) is a medical humanitarian organization that provides emergency medical assistance to people affected by conflict, epidemics, disasters, or exclusion from healthcare.
